Adguard-home.description:
AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking. After you set it up, it'll cover all your home devices, and you won't need any client-side software for that.

Based on the official Image: https://hub.docker.com/r/adguard/adguardhome, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

Create a macvlan to avoid overlapping of ports which are needed by Adguard like 443 & 80. E.g., docker network create -d macvlan --subnet=192.168.178.0/24 --ip-range=192.168.178.58/32 --gateway=192.168.178.1 -o parent=eth0 adguard-home

The docker network has to be named adguard-home!

For the initial setup the UI is reachable under the IP-Adress defined in the macvlan. E.g.: 192.168.178.58. and the setup port 3000, i.e.: http://192.168.178.58:3000. Once setup is complete, the admin page can be reached using port 80 e.g.,http://192.168.178.58:80.
